title: Breda O'Brien: Comparing AI to Wikipedia is like saying a bicycle is similar to a self-driving car
description: Teachers are wearily getting on with the reformed Leaving Cert, but there are some things they just can’t do – like stopping students cheating

title: New AI model can predict 5-year breast cancer risk
description: A new AI model can predict a person's risk of developing breast cancer up to five years in advance by analyzing mammograms. This could make screening much more effective.

title: I asked ChatGPT to pick an undervalued AI stock for my ISA! Here’s what it said...
description: Dr James Fox has invested heavily in AI stocks in recent years and they've taken his portfolio far higher than he could have imagined. The post I asked ChatGPT to pick an undervalued AI stock for my ISA! Here’s what it said... appeared first on The Motley Fool UK.

title: 'We're creatives - this is what AI has done to our jobs'
description: How do an artist, a videographer, a musician and a copywriter feel about generative AI?

title: Cancer stole her voice. She used AI, curse words and kids’ books to get it back
description: When doctors told her they had to remove her tongue and voice box to save her life from the cancer that had invaded her mouth, Sonya Sotinsky sat down with a microphone to record herself saying the things she would...
